content.title: Intro
content.content:
2006
Preceded by
2006
2007
Year
2008
Followed by
2008

Tolkien-related events that took place in 2007.

content.title: January
content.content:
3 - Birthday Toast.
? - Amon Hen 203 is published.

content.title: February
content.content: 2 - The production of the video game The Lord of the Rings: The White Council is put on hold indefinitely; it would later be officially cancelled.

content.title: March
content.content:
1 - The Company They Keep is published.
1 - Electronic Arts releases The Battle for Middle-earth Anthology.
9-11 - The third "The One Ring Celebration" is held in Burbank, California.
25 - Tolkien Reading Day.
? - Amon Hen 204 is published.

content.title: April
content.content:
15 - Tolkien Studies: Volume 4 is published.
17 - The Children of Húrin is published.
24 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar is released.
30 - Roots and Branches is published.

content.title: May
content.content:
1 - The History of The Hobbit Volume 1 is published.
9 - Quest for Middle-earth is published.
15 - Artist Angus McBride dies.
16 - The Deluxe Edition of The Children of Húrin is published.
17 - Actor Noel Appleby dies.
? - Amon Hen 205 is published.

content.title: June
content.content:
4 - The Lord of the Rings: The Official Stage Companion is published.
12 - The fan film The Peril to the Shire premieres to a private audience.
14 - The ninth book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "Shores of Evendim", is released.
19 - The Lord of the Rings (musical) premieres at the Theatre Royal Drury Lane in London.
26 - Tree of Tales is published.
? - Vinyar Tengwar 49 is published.
? - Inside Language is published.

content.title: July
content.content:
13-15 - Tolkien Thing IX
27-29 - MerpCon III.
? - Parma Eldalamberon 17 is published.
? - Amon Hen 206 is published.

content.title: August
content.content:
3-6 - Mythcon 38.
4 - Author Timothy J. Wheeler dies.
8-11 - Omentielva Tatya, the second international conference on Tolkien' s invented languages
21 - The tenth book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "The City of Kings", is released in North America.
24 - The tenth book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "The City of Kings", is released in Europe.
25 - The Tolkien Society's Australian Seminar 2007 in Sydney, Australia.
27 - The Frodo Franchise is published.

content.title: September
content.content:
10 - "from mind to mind": Robert Browning and J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
14-16 - Oxonmoot 2007.
21 - The History of The Hobbit is published in the United States.
? - Amon Hen 207 is published.

content.title: October
content.content:
1 - The second and expanded edition of Tolkien On Fairy-stories is published.
1 – The redesigned slipcased edition of Mr. Bliss is published.
5-7 - Cair Andros, a feast of the Ellinikós Sýllogos Philon Tólkin (or "The Prancing Pony").
12-15 - Ring*Con 2007.
24 - The eleventh book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "Prisoner of the Free Peoples" is released in North America.
25 - The eleventh book of The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar, "Prisoner of the Free Peoples", is released in Europe.

content.title: November
content.content:
6 - Essential Tolkien audiobook is released.
15 - Myth and Magic: Art according to the Inklings is published.
19 - The Children of Húrin Signed Limited Edition is published.
20 - The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - The Complete Recordings is published.
? - Amon Hen 208 is published.

content.title: December
content.content:
1 - Chesterton and Tolkien as Theologians is published.
18 - New Line Cinema and MGM announce the development of The Hobbit (film series).

? - The Lord of the Rings Strategy Battle Game: Mordor is published.
Years
2004 2005 2006 2007 2008 2009 2010
